entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Manicouagan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:56 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lac Manouane East 10:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: -5.2°C
Humidity: 99 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -5.3°C
Wind: E 46 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 30 to 40 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 60 gusting to 90 early this evening then becoming southeast 40 gusting to 70 before morning. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries at times heavy. Temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Local blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind south 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
